sourcesContent:
import {useState} from 'react' import styles from '../styling/form.module.css' import axios from 'axios' function Signup(){ function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); console.log(email,password,userName) axios.post('https://localhost:3000/api/users', { email: email, password: password, name: userName }) } const[email, setEmail] = useState() const[password, setPassword] = useState() const[userName, setUserName] = useState() return(
setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} required>
setUserName(e.target.value)} value={userName} required>
setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password} required>
) } export default Signup
